mapper.select: SELECT rs.slot_id AS slotid, rs.svcid AS svcid, rs.slot_date AS slotDate, rs.start_time AS startTime, rs.end_time AS endTime, CASE WHEN r.slot_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'reserved' ELSE 'available' END AS reservationStatus FROM reservation_slot rs LEFT JOIN reservation r ON rs.slot_id = r.slot_id AND r.status = 'reserved' WHERE rs.svcid = #{svcid} AND rs.slot_date = #{date} ORDER BY rs.start_time
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (user_no, reservation_type, slot_id, price) values(#{user_no}, #{reservation_type}, #{slot_id}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, rs.slot_date, rs.start_time, rs.end_time, rs.svcid, p.status AS payment_status, p.paid_at, p.method, p.amount, p.tid FROM reservation r JOIN reservation_slot rs ON r.slot_id = rs.slot_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p1.* FROM payment p1 JOIN ( SELECT reservation_id, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM payment GROUP BY reservation_id ) latest ON p1.reservation_id = latest.reservation_id AND p1.id = latest.max_id ) p ON r.reservation_id = p.reservation_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservation_id}

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.reservation_type,r.status, r.reserved_at, rs.slot_date, rs.svcid, s.svcnm FROM reservation r JOIN reservation_slot rs on r.slot_id = rs.slot_id JOIN stadium s on rs.svcid = s.svcid where user_no = #{user_no};

SELECT p.*, s.svcnm from payment p left join reservation r on p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN reservation_slot rs on r.slot_id = rs.slot_id join stadium s on rs.svcid = s.svcid where p.user_no = #{user_no};
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = 'cancelled', cancelled_at = now() WHERE reservation_id = #{reservation_id}

UPDATE reservation r JOIN reservation_slot rs ON r.slot_id = rs.slot_id JOIN ( SELECT p.reservation_id FROM payment p JOIN ( SELECT reservation_id, max(id) AS latest_id FROM payment GROUP BY reservation_id ) latest ON p.id = latest.latest_id WHERE p.status IS NULL OR p.status != 'paid' ) unpaid ON r.reservation_id = unpaid.reservation_id SET r.status = 'expired' WHERE r.status = 'reserved' AND timestamp(rs.slot_date, rs.start_time) < now();
